name: Cave Picker
description:
Cave Picker is an adventure game where you explore the woods and collect apples. From the apples you can sell them to your friend "Gertrude".  From her shop you can buy a few survival tools to explore the cave at the bottom left of the map.

Easter Eggs - There are 4 pigeons dotted around the map. Try find them!

I hope you enjoy. Leave a comment what i could improve on. Thank you! >:D
